bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket

components.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger
RockShox Recon Silver TK Solo Air w/ tapered alloy steerer, PopLoc remote lockout, 100mm travel
Shimano Deore, M552 w/ integrated spindle, 42/32/24T
Shimano BB91 press-fit
Shimano Deore, M591, 34.9mm
Shimano Deore XT, M781 SGS Shadow, 10-speed
Shimano Deore, M591 Rapid Fire, 10-speed
Shimano Deore HG62, 11-36T, 10-speed
KMC X10, 10-speed
Formula DC-73 sealed bearing front / Shimano M475 rear, 32H disc hubs, Sun Inferno 23 rims
Schwalbe Racing Ralph, 26" x 2.25", 67 tpi
Hayes Dyno Comp, hydraulic disc, 180mm/160mm rotor
Hayes Dyno Comp hydraulic
FSA 1 1/8" - 1.5", sealed cartridge bearings
Oval M200, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval dual-density Kraton
Oval M200 w/ satin steel rails
